title: Coal likely to remain backbone of country's energy system for next two decades: Eco Survey
description: The Economic Survey 2023-24 highlights coal's continued dominance in India's energy system for the next two decades, with phase-down dependent on importing critical minerals for clean energy. Emphasizing carbon capture technologies, it advocates for coal gasification to reduce reliance on imports and emissions. Coal currently fuels 70% of India's electricity generation
